EN.COULD_NOT_RELOAD_LAYERS: Could not reload layers, something went wrong doing refresh after user error occurred.
EN.DEFAULT_ERROR: Invalid operation, had to either delete or rollback the changes.
EN.LINE_STRING_IS_NOT_SIMPLE: The route segment is not simple.
EN.LINE_STRING_IS_CLOSED: Route segment being closed is not allowed.
EN.LINE_STRING_ENDS_CLOSER_TO_EACH_OTHER_TH: The route segment ends are closer to each other than tolerance.
EN.LINE_STRING_ENDS_CLOSER_TO_THE_EDGE_THAN: The route segment ends are closer the the edge than tolerance.
EN.ROUTE_SEGMENT_INTERSECTS_WITH_MULTIPLE_S: The route segments intersects with multiple start or end nodes.
EN.RECEIVED_INVALID_MESSAGE: Received invalid create or update message.
EN.ROUTE_NODE_INTERSECTS_WITH_ANOTHER_ROUTE: A route node cannot intersect with another route node.
EN.ROUTE_NODE_MODIFIED_LESS_THAN_TOLERANCE: The route node geometry was modified less than the allowed tolerance.
EN.ROUTE_NODE_GEOMETRY_UPDATE_NOT_ALLOWED_T: Route node geometry cannot be modified if it results in intersection with one or more route segments.
EN.ROUTE_NODE_INTERSECT_WITH_ROUTE_SEGMENT_: To delete a route node it must not intersect with any route segments.
EN.ROUTE_NODE_CANNOT_MODIFY_GEOMETRY_AND_MA: You cannot delete a route node and change it's geometry in the same operation.
EN.CANNOT_DELETE_ROUTE_NODE_WITH_RELATED_EQ: You cannot delete a route node when it has related equipment.
EN.CANNOT_DELETE_ROUTE_SEGMENT_WITH_RELATED: You cannot delete a route segment when it has related equipment.

DK.COULD_NOT_RELOAD_LAYERS: Kunne ikke genindlæse lagene, noget gik galt under opdateringen, efter brugerfejlen opstod.
DK.DEFAULT_ERROR: Ugyldig handling, vi var nødt til at rulle ændringerne tilbage.
DK.LINE_STRING_IS_CLOSED: Tracélinjens geometri er lukket, dette er ikke tilladt.
DK.LINE_STRING_ENDS_CLOSER_TO_EACH_OTHER_TH: Tracélinjens endepunkter er tættere på hinanden end tolerancen tillader.
DK.LINE_STRING_ENDS_CLOSER_TO_THE_EDGE_THAN: Tracélinjens slutpunkter er tættere på kanten end tolerancen tillader.
DK.ROUTE_SEGMENT_INTERSECTS_WITH_MULTIPLE_S: Tracélinjens slutpunkter intersekter mere flere start eller slut punkter.
DK.ROUTE_NODE_INTERSECTS_WITH_ANOTHER_ROUTE: Tracéknuden kan ikke flyttes tættere på en anden tracéknude end tolerancen tillader.
DK.ROUTE_NODE_MODIFIED_LESS_THAN_TOLERANCE: Tracéknuden kan ikke flyttes mindre end tolerancen tillader.
DK.ROUTE_NODE_GEOMETRY_UPDATE_NOT_ALLOWED_T: Tracéknuden kan ikke flyttes tættere på en tracélinje end tolerancen tillader.
DK.ROUTE_NODE_INTERSECT_WITH_ROUTE_SEGMENT_: Du kan ikke slette en tracéknude, hvis der går en eller flere tracélinjer til/fra denne.
DK.ROUTE_NODE_CANNOT_MODIFY_GEOMETRY_AND_MA: Du kan ikke slette et tracéknude og ændre dens geometri i samme handling.
DK.CANNOT_DELETE_ROUTE_NODE_WITH_RELATED_EQ: Du kan ikke slette et tracéknude, hvis den har relateret udstyr. Fjern udstyret, derefter kan den slettes.
DK.CANNOT_DELETE_ROUTE_SEGMENT_WITH_RELATED: Du kan ikke slette en tracélinje, hvis den har relateret udstyr. Fjern udstyret, derefter kan den slettes.
